title: Data Set Generator: Part 1
description:
This posts deals with creating the initial mass fractions to be used as initial
conditions for the source terms ODE's.

title: Why Neural Networks and Combustion: An Introduction
description: This post seeks to discuss the potential of Artificial Neural Networks in treating the source terms needed in combustion simulations.   .

title: Welcome to ANN for Combustion Simulations
description:
